comment.body:
I'll wait for your details

Thanks
So, do you like vue.js now? I hope, you not spend time in vain :)
Ekaterina, you're awesome! How do you find so much time for your projects?

> but it's the future of mobile development for Google devices

I very much in this doubt. It does not seem that Google at all strongly puts on Dart

> [ekaterina](#comment_46_1Mk5sVKeCrwMc3wSD11jM7DZTiqF5D9BaD): Haha, thanks! X-Com 2 is great by the way. Haven't played any of the older titles, but X-Com 2 I got a bit addicted to for a while. The character customization alone can keep you occupied for hours! And then your best soldier dies and you reload a save game three times until she finally survives. Grrrr. Now I remember why I haven't played it in a while! :)

Anyway, glad to see you again, Ekaterina!
